messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

check phone from the pm please phone hi please log investigate issues highlighted attached spreadsheet phone more specifically glasgow taken infinite loop after wanting leave voice calls received by test oxford mistake thank thursday march pm phone ring groups rules amended ensure good experience hi everyone anyone apologies please ignore everyone please continue reading ago rule phone rings example somebody caller transferred whatever reason today leads situations which phone rings nobody picks person supposed call logged out phone which causes subsequent calls received assuming two each location suggest situations per create ring each cannot logged out other gets call create romanian ring location call passed after couple seconds somebody nobody replies then call back option way working require little training did yet training phone etiquette please having somebody phone extremely important reputation client somebody has emergency calls especially expected appreciate feedback until mid next wednesday feedback arrives assume ahead suggested changes everyone has training required thank care

message.reasoning:
